data.title: QCP Capital: The trade war remains the biggest uncertainty in the market, and the options market is currently balanced between put options and call options
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News QCP Capital posted on its official channel that the crypto market is still in a roller coaster of volatility. BTC briefly rebounded to $100,000 after news that the United States would postpone tariffs on Mexico and Canada by one month, suggesting possible trade mediation. However, the relief was short-lived as China retaliated with new tariffs, with the price of BTC falling back to $98,000. In addition, China has launched an antitrust investigation into Google, indicating that China is ready to escalate tensions by targeting major U.S. technology companies. Any resulting sanctions or restrictions could weigh on earnings and pose a significant risk to risky assets. As BTC climbed to $100,000 last night, the market also reacted to Trump's executive order directing officials to create a U.S. sovereign wealth fund. While some see this as a potential source of new demand for Bitcoin, the details remain unclear - especially about how to fund it. For now, trade uncertainty continues to cloud the outlook, and as of March, the options market is currently balanced between puts and calls.

data.title: Ethereum’s Sudden Crash: A Manipulated Market Event
data.description:
Ethereum’s dramatic plunge reveals a calculated liquidation event, exploiting market leverage and triggering massive sell-offs.
source: https://dailycoin.com/ethereum-price-crash-market-manipulation-event/?utm_source=cryptopanic&utm_medium=rss

data.title: Taiko and Avalon Labs have reached a cooperation agreement to add liquidity and obtain airdrop qualifications
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to official news, Taiko has reached a cooperation with Avalon Labs. Users can provide TAIKO tokens to the Avalon mining pool and obtain airdrop qualifications. In addition, Taiko network Claim will not require Gas.

Cryptocurrency stocks fall in pre-market trading; MicroStrategy (MSTR.O) down 2%
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News Cryptocurrency stocks fell in pre-market trading as Bitcoin fell more than 3%. Coinbase (COIN.O) fell 1%, MicroStrategy (MSTR.O) fell 2%. Riot Platforms (RIOT.O) fell 1.4%, Hut 8 Mining fell 2.8%, and Mara Holdings fell 1.5%.
